<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>test role query</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var roles = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role'); var roleSysIDs = new Array();
roles.addQuery('user', 'fabbc01beba68e105204f635cad0cdf7'); roles.query();
gs.info("deleting " + roles.getRowCount() + " rows");
while(roles.next()){ roles.deleteRecord(); }
gs.info(roleSysIDs);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jspirko</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-06-05 23:19:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b8547f22ebe68a105204f635cad0cdea</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>test role query</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="15-Minute Digital Product Prototype" source="x_snc_15_minute_se">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="15-Minute Digital Product Prototype">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b8547f22ebe68a105204f635cad0cdea</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>jspirko</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-06-07 16:26:52</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
